name: Baboongamon
effect: [Main] ＜Digi-Burst 2＞ (Trash 2 of this Digimon's digivolution cards to activate the effect below.)・Trigger ＜De-Digivolve 1＞ on 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 7 or less. (Trash 1 card from the top of one of your opponent's Digimon. If it has no digivolution cards, or becomes a level 3 Digimon, you can't trash any more cards.)
